Authors: Mai T Nguyen, Thuy T.P. Doan, Bhushan Shrestha
Title:
Morphological and phylogenetic study of Ophiocordyceps
sphecocephala and Ophiocordyceps asiana inVietnam
Keywords:
insect fungi, morphological characters, phylogenetic
analysis, D1-D2, ITS
Abstract:
Ophiocordyceps is a megagenus of entomopathogenic fungi
belonging to Ophiocordycipitaceae of Hypocreales, Ascomycota. We report
here the morphological and phylogenetic analyses of two Ophiocordyceps
species from Bidoup Nui Ba National Park, Lam Dong Province, southern
Vietnam. Our data showed that one of our studied Ophiocordyceps is a new
intraspecies of O. sphecocephala and another is a new record of O.
asiana from Vietnam.
